Articles.Content:
I figured this forum needs a thread based on this game.

So, first and foremost: Username and favoured aircraft?

I'm game.

Username: Manifesti

favorite plane? gotta be the fw 190, that thing is an amazing diver,

though the P-40 seems to dominate it's matchmaking when it comes to Historical Battles.

Edited May 26, 2013 by Manifest

Username for the Sat is the Sat, and my favourite is the Chaika biplane, because it kicks ass and is a biplane. Despite the awesome plane, I get killed all the time. Suppose that's why pilots need to take vision tests.

I don't play, but I'm looking at it- staring at it actually.

I would be:

Username: The_Destroyer (DUH)

Plane: Do they have the P-51?

A few versions, I'll post the current techtrees in a moment

[EDIT]: A few raw screenshots of whats currently available:

As you can see, I've completely neglected the USAF

Edited May 26, 2013 by chobit-389
amusing look like i entered a war where i fight with enemy.I feel that i am also a pilot of a bomber craft.

Alright, I just signed up to this as well. Just gotta wait while my laptop chews on the roughly 5 gigabyte download involved.

It appears to be a MMOFPS, with up to 32 people per map. So it'll probably handle similarly to TF2 and as such =shouldn't= eat up all of my free time like MMORPGs do.
in game name Roebuck34 invite me to a squad when you want to play currently lvl 11 in almost all nations except ussr and japan

Alright, I just signed up to this as well. Just gotta wait while my laptop chews on the roughly 5 gigabyte download involved.

It appears to be a MMOFPS, with up to 32 people per map. So it'll probably handle similarly to TF2 and as such =shouldn't= eat up all of my free time like MMORPGs do.

Cept it's FAR more gorgeous than TF2 will ever be! I'll start adding people to my friend's list
Does Warthunder work on all computers? Any system requirements for the excellent graphics?

Username: UberKalawang

Aircraft: F-35 Lightning II

Aircraft: F-35 Lightning II

*beats the **** out of you and kicks you into a ditch*

NO! THE F-35 IS A TERRIBLE, USELESS AIRCRAFT THAT SERVES ONLY TO LOOK GOOD FOR THE PUBLIC, FALL APART IN TESTING AND COST THE TAXPAYERS OF MULTIPLE COUNTRIES BILLIONS OF DOLLARS JUST SO THE AMERICANS CAN FLAUNT A NEW TOY!

Warthunder's most modern aircraft are F-86 Sabers and MiG-15s
Ok, Ok, calm down chobit. Could you answer my previous question? Does Warthunder need any system requirements as a result of the graphics?

*beats the **** out of you and kicks you into a ditch*

NO! THE F-35 IS A TERRIBLE, USELESS AIRCRAFT THAT SERVES ONLY TO LOOK GOOD FOR THE PUBLIC, FALL APART IN TESTING AND COST THE TAXPAYERS OF MULTIPLE COUNTRIES BILLIONS OF DOLLARS JUST SO THE AMERICANS CAN FLAUNT A NEW TOY!

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Ofcourse I was kidding

MiGs overall are awesome, by the way. Sat out.

Also, a correction on my name. It's Sat2, apparently.

hm seen wt run on toasters so... if your computer can play this game you can probobly play wt

Oh, good. I'll get it tomorrow then, its getting late and when I get a new game I play it non-stop from anywhere from a few days to a month.

Planned Username: LeonG17

Favourite aircraft: Have to try them first but likely a Spitfire. Would like to try out the Fw190 and the A6M.

Edited May 26, 2013 by LeonG17

I registered the same username as my forum name on here.

When I get it to download (tonight if not tomorrow) you'll probably see me in either an A6M2 or a B17G. If they have a P47 I might fly that as well, the thunderbolt had a very soft stick in Warbirds III and I had a lot of fun with it.

Not too familiar with the German aircraft actually, you'll have to fill me in on what's out there.

Edited May 26, 2013 by OdinYggd
The 47 is a rape machine, but you probably won't like the A6M, it has a roll rate of nope. B-17 is a long crawl but it's base-killing bombload is worth the wait

well i wasted a large portion of my day playing warthunder and so far i am at the beaufort mkVIII watch the

Username RedWolf997

personally my all time favourite aircraft is the Lancaster

How does this work as far as unlocking craft goes?

Cause if I have to actually be any good at it to unlock the craft I like this might annoy me to some extent before I start to enjoy playing it.

And that's surprising that their A6M2 has a poor roll response. In Warbirds III the roll response on the A6M2 was a little sluggish, but definately there when I needed it.

By killing enemies and completing objectives you gain experience with your side. Planes are divided into different levels. For example, if I gain a level with the Soviets, I'd unlock a new tier of their planes.

I would love to play it, but my system sais LOL NOPE to the ground and causes a 50 FPS drop.

Might be just that my system is old.

I would love to play it, but my system sais LOL NOPE to the ground and causes a 50 FPS drop.

Might be just that my system is old.

I know that feeling.

Well, I used to.

Anyway, I'm gonna get it SoonTM.
